welcome_subtitle: Ko te mohiotanga aunoatanga ka taea te whakarite
not_configured_yet: Kaore ano kia whirihorahia te punaha. Ma tenei ruānuku tatūnga koe e awhina ki te whakaara me te whakahaere i to punaha i roto i etahi kaupae.
system_config_start_with_base_and_backup: Whakaora mai i te kōnae pūrua
system_config_include_demo: Whakauruhia te demo me te mahi taputapu whakatairite
dashboard_from_group: Waihangahia he papatohu mai i tenei roopu
group_modules: Ko nga waahanga kei roto i tenei roopu
empty_group: Kāore he kōwae i tēnei rōpū.
cronwizard_dayowselect_selecteddaysow: Nga ra kua tohua o te wiki
cronwizard_schedule_set_slot_end:
Ka timata i {{start}}.
 Tautuhi te mutunga mokamoka wa.
cronwizard_bindings_define_types_and_mod: Tautuhia nga momo me nga waahanga kei raro i tenei waarangi (he kowhiri)
cronwizard_action_set_action_to_execute: Whakaritea he mahi hei mahi i runga i nga takanga o tenei takahanga
cronwizard_action_preset_slot_start: I te timatanga o te waahi waahi
cronwizard_action_preset_slot_end: I te mutunga o te waahi wa
cronwizard_action_schedule_variable_hint: Whakamahia @{{name}} hei taurangi i roto i nga kupu cron, whakamahia ranei Scheduler.IsScheduling("@{{name}}") i roto i nga papatono aunoa hei tohutoro i tenei takahanga.
main_code_empty_note: Ko te waehere "Main" kei te putua. Whakamahia te ētita "Waehere Ataata" hei whakaputa i tenei waehere: - Whakatuwherahia te waahanga "Patono" mai i te papata whakahau kei te taha maui - Toia he poraka momo "Main" ki te mokowāmahi waehere ataata - Tāpirihia ki roto etahi atu poraka waehere hei whakatinana i nga mahi me te arorau o tenei papatono Ko te kaupapa "Main" ka taea te whakahaere ma te ringa, ka tiimata aunoa ranei i runga i nga tikanga kua hoatu ki roto i te waehere Tatūnga.
setup_code_empty_note: Kei te putua te waehere "Tautuhi". Whakamahia te ētita "Waehere Ataata" hei whakaputa i tenei waehere: - Whakatuwherahia te waahanga "Patono" mai i te papata whakahau kei te taha maui - Toia he poraka momo "Tatūnga" ki te mokowāmahi waehere ataata - Taapirihia ki roto etahi atu poraka waehere hei whakatau i nga tikanga ka puta te mahi waehere "Main" Ka arotakehia tenei waehere i nga wa katoa ka puta he huihuinga hou me te neke atu i te kotahi meneti.
capture_commands_description: Tāpirihia ngā whakahau katoa i mahia ā-ringa ki runga widget ki te papatono.
capture_commands_pause: Tatari i waenganui i nga whakahau

16.Title: Mahara Taumata
16.Description: Rokiroki me te maumahara ki te taumata rewharewha whakamutunga.
16.HomeGenie.LevelMemory: Kia maumahara ki te taumata marama whakamutunga ina whakakā ana

26.Title: Rarama Tae
26.Description: He tauira whakauru rama Philips Hue ma te whakamahi i te HTTP API (V1). Ko te kaiwhakamahi taunoa ki te hono atu ki te piriti he "kaiwhakawhanake hou" me te mea kua taea.

34.Title: Huarere Matapae
34.Description: Huarere me nga korero matapae mai i te ratonga Open Weather Map. Hei whakahohe i tenei widget, whakauruhia he matua API whaimana. A pee i nga tohutohu i https://openweathermap.org/appid ki te tiki i te taviri API kore utu.
34.ConfigureOptions.Language: Reo (hei tauira. EN, IT, FR, DE, ...)

77.Title: Whatunga MQTT
77.Description: Hono atu ki tetahi kaihokohoko MQTT ki te whakamahi i te taupānga Paewhiri HomeGenie mai i hea ma te Ipurangi, ki te hono ranei i nga taputapu HomeGenie i runga i te whatunga MQTT kotahi.
77.MQTT.SensorPublish: Whakaputahia nga kaupapa i tukuna e tenei kōwae

78.Title: Weahanga Maamaa
78.Description: Whakamahia tetahi pūoko pāmahana me te whakakā atamai hei whakatinana i te taumahinga thermostat.
78.ConfigureOptions.EnsureCommandDelivery: Me whakarite kia tukuna tonutia ngā whakahau (aratau-pāhekoheko).

81.Title: Aroturuki Pungao
81.Description: Hangaia nga tatauranga mo te whakapau kaha me te whakamahi taputapu.

82.Title: Aratau Tiaki Pungao
82.Description: Puritia te taumata marama ki raro i te ōrau ka taea te whirihora.

88.Title: kāmera IP whānui
88.Description: Whakaatu/arahia te whangai whakaahua mai i te kamera IP.
88.IpCamera.ImageURL: URL API whakaahua kamera (tirohia o tuhinga kamera)

90.Title: Pūnaha Whakaoho Haumaru
90.Description: Whakamahia nga pūoko me etahi atu taputapu hei whakatinana i te punaha whakaoho haumaru.
90.HomeGenie.SecurityTriggerHome: Ka puta ano i te wa e mau ana te Kainga
90.ConfigureOptions.Email.Recipients: Kua wehea te rarangi o nga kaiwhiwhi ī-mēra mo nga whakamohiotanga whakaoho
90.ConfigureOptions.System.SirenMaxTime: Waa nui o nga tangi (hekona, 0=kore mutunga)
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.ArmedProgram: He kaupapa hei whakahaere ina mau patu
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.DisarmedProgram: Ka whakahaere te kaupapa ina wetekina
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.TriggeredProgra: Ka whakahaeretia te papatono ina whakaohohia

111.Title: Whirihoranga Kiritaki
111.Description: Ka whakatinanahia te API mo te whakahaere i nga korero whirihoranga a te kiritaki e whakamahia ana ki te penapena i nga tautuhinga UI me nga papatohu.

400.Title: Whakaaturanga Mokowhiti Mariko
400.Description: Tautuhi-a-ringa i nga uara o te taputapu mariko.

401.Title: Demo - Takahuri kuaha
401.Description: Ka whakataurite i te kuaha tuwhera/kati o te puoko tatau-matapihi demo.

402.Title: Whakaaturanga - Kua Kitea Te Motini
402.Description: Ka whakatauira i te kitenga nekehanga o te tohu-maha-sensor.

505.Title: Mana Mamao
505.Description: Whakahaerehia te taputapu ma te whakamahi i te mamao (IR, RF ranei).

142.Title: Pūkete Ī-Mēra
142.Description: Pupuri ana i nga korero kaute ī-mēra e whakamahia ana e nga kaupapa punaha mo te tuku/tango imeera.
142.ConfigureOptions.Email.SmtpUseSsl: 6. Ka whakamahi te tūmau SMTP i te SSL

145.Title: Pūrere Maamaa
145.Description: Whakakā/whakawetohia te taputapu i runga i te kitenga nekehanga me te rama a tawhio noa.
145.HomeGenie.SmartLights.CheckLuminosity: Whakahaerehia e te pūoko marama (he kōwhiringa)
145.HomeGenie.SmartLights.SwitchOffTimeout: Whakawetohia i muri i te waahi kore mahi (hekona)
145.HomeGenie.SmartLights.MinLuminance: Whakakā mena kei raro te rama:

8.Title: Tauaringa Tae o te Ra
8.Description: He tauira "Sunrise" te ahuatanga mo te huri i te tae o nga rama LED.
8.Scenarios.SunriseColors: Hononga ki te ahuatanga o te Sunrise Colors

910.Title: Rapunga Ahanoa
910.Description: Rapua nga taonga ma te whakamahi i te tauira YOLO kua whakangungua.
910.ML.ObjectDetection.TriggerDetect: Ko te rarangi whakawehenga piko o nga mea (i te reo Ingarihi) ka puta te whakaoho. (hei tauira: ngeru, kuri, tangata, peketua, pekepeke)
910.ConfigureOptions.Yolo.ModelPath: Ara o te kōnae tauira YOLO (.onnx)

911.Title: Whakatau Whakatau
911.Description: Te kimi tohu matua ma te whakatau tata, ma te whakamahi i nga tauira ONNX ritenga, i te tauira YOLO kua whakangungua-mua ranei (whakaahua-tangata).
911.ConfigureOptions.Yolo.ModelPath: Ara o te kōnae tauira YOLO (.onnx)

912.Title: Tauira Wehewehenga
912.Description: Rapua he ahanoa me o raatau whakahuahua ma te whakamahi i te tauira YOLO kua oti te whakangungu.
912.ConfigureOptions.Yolo.ModelPath: Ara o te kōnae tauira YOLO (.onnx)

930.Title: Gemini Intent Handler
930.Description: Ka taea te whakahaere reo maori mo to punaha atamai ma te whakamahi i te Gemini AI a Google. Hei whakahohe i tenei ahuatanga, whakauruhia he matua API whaimana. A pee i nga tohutohu i https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey ki te tiki i te taviri API kore utu.

931.Title: Gemini Widget Genie
931.Description: Ko to taangata AI mo te hanga widget. Na Gemini, ka awhina koe ki te tuhi me te patuiro i te HTML, CSS, me te waehere JavaScript ki roto tonu i te ētita HomeGenie. Hei whakahohe i tenei ahuatanga, whakauruhia he matua API whaimana. A pee i nga tohutohu i https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey ki te tiki i te taviri API kore utu.

940.Title: AI ā-Rohe
940.Description: Whakahaerehia ngā LLM hou rawa atu i runga i tō tūmau HomeGenie. Kei roto ko te API katoa hei whakahaere i te AI mai i ētahi atu papatono me ngā tuhinga.
940.ConfigureOptions.MaxTokens: Te Roa o te Urupare (Ngā Tohu Mōrahi)
940.ConfigureOptions.ModelPath: Ara ki te kōnae GGUF paetata
940.ConfigureOptions.MaxTurns: Mahara Kōrerorero (Tauira Mōrahi) (0 = kāore he rohe)
940.ConfigureOptions.SendContextData: Tohaina te horopaki pūnaha me te kōwae ki te AI

575.Title: Kaiwhakahaere Tikiake
575.Description: He ratonga whakawhiti kōnae HTTP(S) pakari, kore-tukutahi, e wātea ana mā te API motuhake. Ka whakahaere i te huringa katoa o te tango, e tautoko ana i te whakamutu/tīmata anō (mā te whakamahi i ngā pane Range) me te whakahaere kōnae rangitahi (.part).

576.Title: Kaiwhakahaere Kōnae
576.Description: He ratonga haumaru, e whakahaerehia ana e te API, mō te pānui me te tuhi i ngā kōnae i roto i te kōpaki raraunga turanga o te kaupapa. Ka tautokohia e ia ngā ihirangi aho rua mata me te UTF-8 mā roto i ngā whakahau ReadText me WriteText motuhake.

577.Title: Ratonga Hītori Kōrerorero
577.Description: He ratonga HomeGenie pokapū mō te whakahaere me te pupuri i ngā rangitaki kōrerorero AI. Mā te API kotahi (System.Utility/ChatHistory), ka whakaratohia he horopaki tiritahi ki ngā LLM kapua me ngā LLM ā-rohe, he rokiroki JSON aunoa, me te whakahaere hītori wā-tūturu.

578.Title: Mīhini Horopaki
578.Description: Ratonga pokapū mō te whakaputa i ngā tohu AI hihiri. Ka whakakīia e ia ngā tauira ki te rārangi o ngā taputapu ka taea te whakahaere me te tūnga o te pūnaha ora (huarere, pūngao, pūoko), kia mōhio ai te AI ki te kāinga i te wā tūturu.

570.Title: Aroturuki Raraunga
570.Description: Ratonga tātari pokapū mō ngā tatauranga mō ngā kōwae hītori. Ka taea te tiki hihiri i ngā raraunga raupapa-wā me ngā tātari tukatuka tohu kua hangaia (Simple Average, Moving Average, Savitzky-Golay) hei whakarato raraunga ma, maeneene hoki mō ngā tūtohi me te aroturuki pūnaha.

571.Title: Ngā Tatauranga Whakamahinga Pūngao
571.Description: Ka aroturuki tonu, ka kohikohi, ka tuhi hoki i ngā raraunga whakapaunga pūngao (W/h) i ngā wā auau. Ka whakatinana i tētahi API katoa mō te tirotiro me te uiui i ngā huinga raraunga tawhito.

572.Title: Tauira Tatauranga Tūtohi Porowhita
572.Description: He tauira kaiwhakarato tūtohi e whakaatu ana hei tūtohi porowhita me ngā raraunga pūmau.

573.Title: Te Whakapaunga Pūngao ia Wiki
573.Description: He tūtohi pae e whakaatu ana i te toharite o te whakamahinga o te Watts/Hāora mō ia rā o te wiki (Mane-Rātapu). Ka kohikohia ngā raraunga puta noa i ngā hāora katoa o te rā, ā, ka ahu mai i te Energy Use Statistics API.

574.Title: Te Whakamahinga Pūngao ia Hāora
574.Description: He tūtohi pae e whakaatu ana i te toharite o te whakamahinga o ngā Watts/Hāora mō ia hāora o te rā (00h-23h). Ka kohikohia ngā raraunga mō te wiki kua tīpakohia, ā, ka ahu mai i te Energy Use Statistics API.

scheduler_preset_action_genie_command: Te Whakahau a te Ira Tangata
scheduler_preset_action_config_wish.plac: Whakamātauria: "Whakatakotoria te wera ki te 22° ka tīmata te tirohanga o te Rāwhiti"
